title: POTLUCK TUESDAY
content: See Chris to signup for the potluck by end of day.

title: Elevators on east wing are inoperative
content: Take the stairs. Unfortunately the elevator is under maintenance.

title: Company 5k Run
content: Our company is hosting a 5k run. We would like all the support we can get. Feel free to join and have some fun!

title: Security: Do not click on links from untrusted email addresses
content: Make sure to report all suspicious email addresses to IT
